subject: [Lab 05] Q3: Don't violate the abstraction barrier!
content:
Q3: Don't violate the abstraction barrier!

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q3: Don't violate the abstraction barrier! in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: I really don't think I violated the abstraction barrier, but I got an error that "string indices must be integers". What does that mean?

follow-ups.feedback: Check which line you got this error on: see if a string is being indexed, and see what the indices are
